table_description: NodeBalancers that are assigned to this Linode and readable by the requesting User.

columns.name: id
columns.description: The unique ID of this NodeBalancer.

columns.name: label
columns.description: The NodeBalancer's label. These must be unique on your Account.

columns.name: region
columns.description: The Region where this NodeBalancer is located. NodeBalancers only support backends in the same Region.

columns.name: client_conn_throttle
columns.description: Throttle connections per second (0-20). Set to 0 (zero) to disable throttling.

columns.name: transfer
columns.description: Information about the amount of transfer this NodeBalancer has had so far this month.

columns.name: tags
columns.description: An array of tags applied to this object. Tags are for organizational purposes only.
